messages.subject: Google: was Peaceful Parenting
messages.msgSnippet: ... Google is as reliable (or not) as any part of the internet.  Learning to judge reliability on the internet is an interesting study.  You ve got to be
messages.messageBody:
> << Also, are the websites that come up when I used
>
> Google reliable sources? >>
>
> Sources of what? That was an interesting queston and I don't know how to
> respond!

Google is as reliable (or not) as any part of the internet. Learning to
judge reliability on the internet is an interesting study. You've got to be
skeptical. You've got to think about who it is that's putting this info out
there. You've got to check more than one site, and if you really want
reliability (in publishing, for instance) you'd need to check the info
against other sources. I often use Google or Yahoo as a starting point to
see just what's out there.
Tia

"They that can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary
saftety deserve neither liberty nor safety." Ben Franklin
